main event: A civilian woman reported a sighting of a circular-shaped UFO in Albany, New York on October 6, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 seconds,The UFO circled once before heading north,There was no sound associated with the sighting,The report indicates that there were no other known objects in the area at that time,The sighting occurred 44 minutes after USDA, Albany released a pinair.
